info.title: Oedi API
info.description: Oedi API powered by Firebase Functions and Moralis, base_url: https://asia-northeast3-oedi-a1953.cloudfunctions.net/v1

webhookUrl.description: Webhook URL to send stream data on

triggers.description: Triggers to listen for on blockchain

nft_image_url.description: NFT's image URL to be displayed on profile

nft_tokenId.description: user's NFT token ID on given contract

chain.description: The chain of the network e.g '0x1' for Ethereum Mainnet

message.description: The message that is signed by the user
The message that is signed by the user

post.summary: Creates a new stream on Moralis server

put.summary: Updates a stream on Moralis server

get.summary: Gets all streams on Moralis server

delete.summary: Deletes a stream on Moralis server

post.summary: Adds an address to a stream

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Stream ID where address is to be added

post.summary: Removes an address from a stream

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Stream ID where address is to be removed

get.summary: Gets all addresses from a stream

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Stream ID where addresses are to be fetched

post.summary: Creates a new user's profile on Firestore

put.summary: Updates a user's profile on Firestore

get.summary: Gets a user's profile on Firestore
Gets a user's profile on Firestore

delete.summary: Deletes a user's profile on Firestore

post.summary: Request a message to be signed by the user. BaseURL: https://asia-northeast3-oedi-a1953.cloudfunctions.net

200.description: The response object containing the message needs to be signed by the user

example1.summary: The response object containing the message needs to be signed by the user
example1.value:
{
    'result': {
        'id': 'ZJN2CfqMldUWgezVH',
        'message': 'oedi-a1953.web.app wants you to sign in with your Ethereum account:
0x1Efd3eFd7c78d98B155F724EB6A161C50d8CFbf0

To authenticate please sign this message.

URI: https://oedi-a1953.web.app/
Version: 1
Chain ID: 1
Nonce: Cwt6fznrxgHvIXdvv
Issued At: 2023-02-05T12:53:06.907Z
Expiration Time: 2023-02-05T13:08:06.641Z
Not Before: 2023-02-05T12:53:06.641Z',
        'profileId': '0xad339ed840cb8c4e8f33a6fd07672c53f1c35ed197ba49f1536b43e27cb8b4a8'
    }
}

requestBody.description: The request body object containing the data object with the networkType, address and chain

post.summary: Issue a token for the user after verifying the signature, BaseURL: https://asia-northeast3-oedi-a1953.cloudfunctions.net

200.description: The response object containing the auth token(custom token)

example1.summary: The response object containing the auth token(custom token)

example1.value:
{
  'data': {
   'networkType': 'evm',
   'message': 'oedi-a1953.web.app wants you to sign in with your Ethereum account:
0x1Efd3eFd7c78d98B155F724EB6A161C50d8CFbf0

To authenticate please sign this message.

URI: https://oedi-a1953.web.app/
Version: 1
Chain ID: 1
Nonce: Cwt6fznrxgHvIXdvv
Issued At: 2023-02-05T12:53:06.907Z
Expiration Time: 2023-02-05T13:08:06.641Z
Not Before: 2023-02-05T12:53:06.641Z',
   'signature': '0xEfd3eFEfd3eFEfd3eF1Efd3eFd7c78d98B155F724EB6A161C50d8CFbf0eFEfd3eF1Efd3eFd7c78d9d3eFEfd3eF1Efd3eFd7c78d98B155F724EB6A161C50d8CFbf0eFEfd3eF1Efd3eFd7c78d9'
   }
   }

requestBody.description: The request body object containing the data object with the networkType, message and signature

post.summary: Issue a jwt/id token for the user after verifying the signature, BaseURL: https://asia-northeast3-oedi-a1953.cloudfunctions.net/v1

200.description: The response object containing the auth token(JWT token)

example1.summary: The response object containing the auth token(JWT token)

example1.value:
{
   'networkType': 'evm',
   'message': 'oedi-a1953.web.app wants you to sign in with your Ethereum account:
0x1Efd3eFd7c78d98B155F724EB6A161C50d8CFbf0

To authenticate please sign this message.

URI: https://oedi-a1953.web.app/
Version: 1
Chain ID: 1
Nonce: Cwt6fznrxgHvIXdvv
Issued At: 2023-02-05T12:53:06.907Z
Expiration Time: 2023-02-05T13:08:06.641Z
Not Before: 2023-02-05T12:53:06.641Z',
   'signature': '0xEfd3eFEfd3eFEfd3eF1Efd3eFd7c78d98B155F724EB6A161C50d8CFbf0eFEfd3eF1Efd3eFd7c78d9d3eFEfd3eF1Efd3eFd7c78d98B155F724EB6A161C50d8CFbf0eFEfd3eF1Efd3eFd7c78d9'
   }

requestBody.description: The request body object containing the data object with the networkType, message and signature

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User ID to get friends list

get.summary: Gets a user's friend requests, which are pending for user to accept/reject
Gets a user's friend requests, which are pending for user to accept/reject

post.summary: Sends a friend request to another user
Accepts a friend's request of given user
Rejects a friend's request of given user
Unfriends a given user from current user's friend list
